== Short waves ==
* Peak $H_{m0}$ and $T_p$ are ~2.52m and 9.2s, respectfully
	* Following the [[XBeach]] documentation the estimated [[IG waves|IG wave]] period is: $T_p * 4 = 36.8s$
	* For this $T_p$, the depth needed to satisfy $n \leq 0.8$ is $d =\approx 14.5m$
